explains: adj. 不平衡的，倾向一方的

sentences.en: To sum up: a system of conservation based solely on economic self-interest is hopelessly lopsided.
sentences.cn: 总而言之：一个完全基于经济利己主义的保护体系是不可救药的不平衡。

sentences.en: His suit had shoulders that made him look lopsided.
sentences.cn: 他西装的肩部使他看上去两肩高低不平。

sentences.en: The article presents a somewhat lopsided view of events.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章对事情的看法显得有些片面。
